Module webfx.extras.time.layout.gantt
Package dev.webfx.extras.time.layout.gantt.impl

Class EnclosingRow<THIS extends EnclosingRow<THIS>>

java.lang.Object
dev.webfx.extras.geometry.MutableBounds
dev.webfx.extras.time.layout.impl.ObjectBounds<O>
dev.webfx.extras.time.layout.impl.LazyObjectBounds<THIS>
dev.webfx.extras.time.layout.gantt.impl.EnclosingRow<THIS>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bounds
Direct Known Subclasses:
GrandparentRow, ParentRow
public abstract class EnclosingRow<THIS extends EnclosingRow<THIS>> extends LazyObjectBounds<THIS>
A base class for enclosing rows (parent & grandparent row). Its bounds represent the enclosing bounds that contain all elements inside (the header plus all the content such as the children for a parent row). The header is a separate LazyObjectBounds that can be in different positions (see HeaderPosition) inside that enclosing row and that will be drawn by the application.
Author:
Bruno Salmon
